bibl.title: Bibelrezeption auf spätantiken Textilien.
bibl.note: The number of Late Antique textiles with explicitly Christian themes is comparatively small in relationship to the total number of finds. Images from the Old Testament predominate, with a special position for the story of Joseph. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Renate Pillinger, Bibelrezeption auf spätantiken Textilien.
Mitteilungen zur christlichen Archäologie 20 (2014) pp. 51-74, 42 figg. coul.

The number of Late Antique textiles with explicitly Christian themes is comparatively small in relationship to the total number of finds. Images from the Old Testament predominate, with a special position for the story of Joseph. - Avec résumé en anglais.
